description.value: The alchemist’s dyes congeal and solidify, allowing him to make physical objects from them. The alchemist can expend two uses of his daily bombs to create a nonmagical object, as @Compendium[pf1.spells.jsvjsax2eabrlx8g]{Minor Creation}, using his alchemist level as the spell’s caster level. The alchemist must be at least 8th level and have the divine inks discovery before selecting this discovery.
